function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of urban system preparedness for respiratory pandemics","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and lack of effective response","Mitigation":"Developing urban systems and capacities to make cities resilient to prevent the spread of infectious diseases","Technologies":"Smart cities and digitization for effective urban planning","People":"Urban residents, city leadership, public health officials","Owner":"City planners, public health agencies, urban development organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate collaboration across sectors and disciplines","Impact":"Limited ability to address urban health issues and prevent disease spread","Mitigation":"Emphasizing collaboration across sectors and disciplines with an urban health focus","Technologies":"Smart city technology for data sharing and analysis","People":"Public health officials, city planners, urban development organizations","Owner":"Collaborative taskforces, urban health organizations"},{"Description":"Poor integration of pandemic guidance into urban planning","Impact":"Ineffective response to pandemics and lack of preparedness","Mitigation":"Integrating pandemic guidance from organizations like CDC and WHO into urban planning processes","Technologies":"Digital platforms for disseminating and implementing pandemic guidance","People":"City planners, urban development organizations, public health officials","Owner":"City planning departments, public health agencies"}]}
